Html: While we are currently focusing on Visual Studio 2005 as our main focus for the controls I don’t want to exclude other options like SharpDevelop. Earlier version of the controls worked for the most part in SharpDevelop but had a few design issues. I’m not sure if it was the fact that SharpDevelop 2 was a beta or an issue with the control. If anyone is interested in working with SharpDevelop or another IDE and the controls I think it would be a good idea.
The earlier design issues seem to be gone now. I’ve not tested extensively but everything worked well with what I have done with SharpDevelop 2.
